projects.title: Cocktail-O-Clock
projects.desc: Cocktail-O-Clock is an dynamic interactive front-end application that seeks to inform the user about the cocktail of their choice, whilst adding a fun, entertaining element in the form a GIF.

projects.title: Bootstrap Demo
projects.desc: This repository demonstrate a portfolio layout using HTML, advance CSS and Bootstrap from scratch.

projects.title: Professional README Generator
projects.desc: This project is to create a command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md file from a user's input.
